import java.util.Scanner;

public class RockPaperScissors {
	
	public enum Option {
		ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS, EXIT;
	}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		final Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
		Option option = Option.ROCK, cumputer = Option.ROCK;
		
		System.out.println("rockpaperscissors:)))))");
		
		while(option != Option.EXIT) {
			System.out.print("select option (rock=0, scissors=1, paper=2, exit=3): ");
			option = Option.values()[scanner.nextInt()]; cumputer = muchDecide();
			if(option == cumputer)
				System.out.println("Wow tie");
			else
				System.out.println("Wow " + (veryWinner(option, cumputer) ? "you win" : "cumputer won"));
		} 

		scanner.close();
	}
	
	public static Option muchDecide() {
		return Option.values()[(int) Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)]; 
	}
	
	public static boolean veryWinner(final Option selected, final Option cumputer) {
		if(selected == Option.ROCK && cumputer == Option.SCISSORS 
				|| selected == Option.PAPER && cumputer == Option.ROCK 
				|| selected == Option.SCISSORS && cumputer == Option.PAPER)
			return true;
		return false;
	}
	
}
